name: Armoonauts
description:
Armoonauts is the result of our first gamejam in MalagaJam. Created during GlobalGameJam 2017, we hope you enjoy the game as much as we did creating it.

How to Play: Use the cursor and the "1, 2, 3" keys to send orders to your armoonauts and guide them to their destiny! The way is full of traps, so care about not causing its destiny to arrive earlier than supposed!!
